tool.name: Extract Sequences from References
tool.description: extract sequence ranges in a contig or chromosome

param.name: reference
param.label: Which reference to use?
param.help: If your contig from IWGSC contigs (such as IWGSC_CSS_7AL_scaff_4491815), then choose the first 1; if it is from CS pseudomolecule v1.0, then choose the 2nd

tool.help:
**OVERVIEW**
This tool extract sequences ranges from a chromosome or contig. The input file is a **tab or space delimited** range file and each line looks like this (contig or chromosome name, sequence range, and strand(plus or minus) )
IWGSC_CSS_7AL_scaff_4491815 4033-4133 plus
IWGSC_CSS_7AL_scaff_4552312 3190-3290 plus
output file is a fasta file file and looks like this:
>IWGSC_CSS_7AL_scaff_4491815 4033-4133
AGGTCTCACAGATTTACATACTAGGGGCTCGAGGCCCAACATAGCTCGATTACATCATATCGAGTGGCATCGAGGAGGGGTTTGGCAACTCTGGTGGCCGT
>IWGSC_CSS_7AL_scaff_4552312 3190-3290
CATATAGGACAAGATCCGAGAGCTCGTTTGCCATGATTAACCAGCCATGGGAGGCACCGCAGCAGGCCACAGCTTGGCCCCTGGGAAAGCTGACCTGAAAA
------
For more information, please check: https://github.com/pinbo/getKASP_pipeline
